channel.title: How to change trisidia v3 background image?
channel.description: How to change trisidia v3 background image? Can anyone help or ill send u my client and you can do it

item.title: How to change trisidia v3 background image?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“malimt, post:4, topic:512349”]its in the (cache) which should be in (mycomputer C:/drive ) or (mycomputer/C:/drive/users/yourusername)
and then once you find the cache (.TrisidiaXCache) the name should be something like that , if its already in a folder which it should be then open up the folder go to (spirites) then in there search for (background.png) and you’ll see it just replace it with ur pic that u wana put (copy&paste) it or whatnot, and if the cache is in a .zip file you might eana extract it , and then follow the same steps once its done extracting into a folder
hope this works goodluck[/quote]
Great job. You took my answer, and managed to make it more spoonfed.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change trisidia v3 background image?

item.title: How to change trisidia v3 background image?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

its in the (cache) which should be in (mycomputer C:/drive ) or (mycomputer/C:/drive/users/yourusername)
and then once you find the cache (.TrisidiaXCache) the name should be something like that , if its already in a folder which it should be then open up the folder go to (spirites) then in there search for (background.png) and you’ll see it just replace it with ur pic that u wana put (copy&paste) it or whatnot, and if the cache is in a .zip file you might eana extract it , and then follow the same steps once its done extracting into a folder
hope this works goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: How to change trisidia v3 background image?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

League317:

Go to chache, and sprite editor change it from there

what’s a chache?

Anyways. Find the cache directory (Normally User Root or C:/) and find the sprite within there.
